mapper.insert: insert into tbl_dboard (title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_dboard where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from tbl_dboard where bno > 0
